caption:
For many of you, it’s that time of year: performance reviews. A great moment to pause, reflect, and think about where you’ve been and where you want to go.

In @peopleplaybook’s latest podcast with host @tony.mcgaharan, our VP of People, Flick, shares key insights from our ‘Conversations with High Performers’ development program on how to follow your Career Compass 🧭.

In this episode, she covers three points on helping you grow with intention:

1️⃣ Identifying your superpowers
2️⃣ Practical tips for practical growth
3️⃣ Building your decision-making toolkit

Flick herself joined TravelPerk in 2018 as a Strategic Account Manager, later discovering her passion for People development, which led her to switch careers and brought her to the role she has now, leading our People team.

🎧👆 Listen the full podcast on our Linktree.
